
		<h1 class="postTitle">
			<a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/18613802" title="发布于 2024-12-18 20:11">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">批量数据传入数据库方法方案</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>前端处理好的数据，不是1笔2笔的问题，而是每次几笔或是大批量数据传入数据库。<br>实际上，还是讲求效率与性能。<br>在Insus.NET的博客中，找到几篇以前的随笔，<br>1 &nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/3779879.html" target="_blank">使用SqlBulkCopy导入数据至MS SQL Server</a> &nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/3779879.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/3779879.html <br><br></a>2 &nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/6241186.html" target="_blank">ASP.NET MVC一次删除多笔记录</a> &nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/6241186.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/6241186.html<br></a></p>
<p>3 &nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/6477701.html" target="_blank">ASP.NET MVC一次删除多笔记录 V2.0</a>&nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/6477701.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/6477701.html<br></a></p>
<p>4 &nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/archive/2012/09/22/2698515.html" target="_blank">存储过程参数为DataTable</a>&nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/archive/2012/09/22/2698515.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/archive/2012/09/22/2698515.html<br></a></p>
<p>5 &nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/archive/2010/12/25/1916591.html" target="_blank">SQL定义自己定义表类型</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/archive/2010/12/25/1916591.html" target="_blank"> https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/archive/2010/12/25/1916591.html<br></a></p>
<p>6 &nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/10922018.html" target="_blank">重复批量上传数据处理</a>&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/10922018.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/10922018.html</a></p>
<p><br>在数据定义一个表类型，如上#5随笔，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218193318502-1918554257.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218193318502-1918554257.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p><br>写存储过程，@DataTable存储过程参数，参数类型，即是上面创建的表类型</p>
<p><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218194112938-1792522467.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218194112938-1792522467.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p><br>前端需要传入数据库的数据DataTable,</p>
<p><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218194901613-1946326307.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218194901613-1946326307.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

前端处理，并收集需要更新的数据，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218200604130-1963325458.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241218200604130-1963325458.png" alt=""></a>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
